description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Galio's''' next [[basic attack]] becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}} and deals {{passive progression/deprecated version|15 to 200|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}} to its target and all enemies around it.
''Colossal Smash'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to all targets hit.
i1.notes: * {{ii|Sheen|Spellblade}} will also get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.

q1.name: Winds of War
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' creates two windblasts 250 units to either side of him that arc out before converging to the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies they pass through.

When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that persists for 2 seconds and slowly moves forward, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to every enemy within, with the target's health ratio capped at 150 damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
leveling: {{st|Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|2% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.6{{recurring|6}}%}} per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Tornado Magic Damage|{{as|8% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.6{{Recurring|6}}}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
q1.notes:
* Deals {{tip|area damage}} on the gust and applies {{tip|persistent area damage}} for the tornado. 
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block each windblast individually.
** The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.

e1.name: Justice Punch
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' {{tip|lunge|steps}} backwards in the opposite direction and, after the cast time, he {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, though not through terrain, until he collides with an enemy champion.
'''Galio''' deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit in his path, reduced by 50% against non-champions, and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90 to 250}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Non-Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90/2 to 250/2}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Galio''' can cast movement effects during the ability, and buffers all other active effects.
* '''Galio''' will initiate the {{tip|dash}} even if his step backwards is {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}}.
* '''Galio's''' second dash will always dash the distance of the target direction. Having the step backwards cut short has no effect on the total distance gained.

r1.name: Hero's Entrance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' designates the target allied {{tip|champion|champion's}} location at the time of cast as his landing spot, resetting {{ais|Shield of Durand 2|Galio|Shield of Durand}} passive magic {{tip|shield}} for himself and additionally granting it to all allied champions in the area he casted it at for 5 seconds, and {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|2.75}} seconds.

After {{fd|1.25}} seconds of the activation, '''Galio''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} then leaps into the air for {{tt|{{fd|0.85 seconds}}|Estimated}} before {{tip|dash|dashing}} to the location over {{tt|{{fd|0.25 seconds}}|Estimated}}, after which he lands and becomes targetable again, retaining the immunity for {{tt|{{fd|0.4 seconds}}|Estimated}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact as well as {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} 100 units over {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
r1.notes:
* ''Hero's Entrance'' does not resist allied {{tip|crowd control}}.
* '''Galio''' cannot cast ''Hero's Entrance'' on allies he cannot {{tip|sight|see}} while {{tip|Nearsight|nearsighted}}.
* '''Galio''' will still cause an impact to occur at the destination even if he is unable to travel the full distance with the dash (e.g. by {{ais|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} and {{ais|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} borders and terrain). '''Galio''' will dash as far as he can go, and thus, does not end the dash prematurely.
* '''Galio''' will always dash 100 units minimum, and dash ''over'' his target's location if they are less than 100 units away from him.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Galio''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|move=false|items=false, true|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=death, root, silence, ground}}
* ''Hero's Entrance's'' channel can only be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}} in the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
